Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng) degree (Hons) and Master of Engineering (M.Eng) degree from Northeastern University,P. R. China, June 2004 and March 2007, respectively. Work Experience During Apr.-Sep. 2007, I worked with Prof. Andrew Leung as a research associate at City University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong. During Apr.-Jun. 2010, I worked with Prof. Stuart D. Milner and Prof. Christopher C. Davis as an exchange researcher at the Department of Electronic and Computer Engineering, University of Maryland, College Park, USA. Dec. 2010-Dec. 2011, I held a Postdoctoral Fellowship and worked with Prof. Jonathan Q. M. Wu at the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Windsor, Ontario, Canada. Mar. 2012-Dec. 2018, I am an Associate Professor at the Department of Computer Science, Shenzhen Graduate School, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen, P. R. China. Jan. 2019-Present, I am a Full Professor at the Department of Computer Science, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen, P. R. China. My Talk [1].
